mapper.insert: insert into directorboard (num, title, writer, contents, reg_date, hit, genre, curPrice, targetPrice, state, targetDate, fname, oname, openDate) values (directorboard_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0, #{genre}, 0, #{targetPrice}, 1, #{targetDate}, #{fname}, #{oname}, sysdate)
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum r, t.* from (select * from DIRECTORBOARD
and genre like '%'||#{item}||'%'
and state=0
and state=1
order by num desc) t) where r between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
mapper.update: update DIRECTORBOARD set state=0 where TARGETDATE < SYSDATE
update DIRECTORBOARD set state=0 where num=#{num}
mapper.select:
select count(num) from (select * from DIRECTORBOARD
and genre like '%'||#{item}||'%'
and state=0
and state=1
)
select * from (select * from DIRECTORBOARD, (select trunc(sysdate) from dual) F ) where targetdate=trunc(sysdate)
